feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How can I track BOM change history without using ECM in S/4HANA Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

In our S/4HANA Cloud system, we are facing an issue with BOM (Bill of Material) changes.

  • Sometimes other users modify the BOM, but I cannot easily see what was changed, when it was changed, or by whom.

  • I also need to check historical versions of the BOM for comparison or troubleshooting.

  • I know that Engineering Change Management (ECM) can control BOM changes using Change Numbers, but for our daily business it is not very convenient to use ECM for every small update.

My questions are:

  1. Is there any way to view BOM change logs (who changed, what component was added/removed/modified) without using ECM?

  2. Can I see the historical BOM structure or previous versions of the BOM in standard S/4HANA Cloud?

  3. Is there any Fiori app, CDS view, or report that can show BOM change documents automatically (STPO/STKO change history)?

  4. How do other companies monitor BOM changes to avoid silent modifications that nobody notices?

Any suggestions or best practices would be highly appreciated. Thank you!

Best regards,
Youzheng Tu

entry.title: Country of Origin for Material
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

If the same material is procured from different countries of origin, how can this be maintained in the Material Master? Additionally, how can we generate reports for materials based on their country of origin? Please correct me if my understanding is incorrect, and suggest any alternative approaches if available.

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: Discount Based on Sales Employee
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

In the public cloud, is it possible to set controls or restrictions on the level of discount that a sales employee can offer ?. Also is there are any reports available for this scenario ?.

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: Code of S4hana public cloud Standart Fiori Apps to BTP
entry.content:
HI all, on Public cloud is there any way to download the code of Standart Fiori app?

From time to time we have requirements to create side-by-side developments that re-create some apps from Cloud on BTP with more functionalities. Sometimes easy way would be clone the app on BTP, and after perform necessary changes.

What is the easy way to do that on S4/hana Public cloud?

entry.title: How can I view change history (Change Log) of Production Orders in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

We are using SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Cloud), and I am trying to track changes made to Production Orders (PP orders).

For example:

  • Someone changes the quantity, component assignment, work center, dates, status, or BOM/routing assignment in a production order.

  • I want to know who changed it, what was changed, and when it was changed.

  • In BOM we can use “Manage Bill of Material – Version 2” to view change logs, but I cannot find a similar way for production orders.

My questions are:

  1. Is there any Fiori app or standard function to view change documents / change history for production orders in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

  2. Does SAP Cloud support tracking changes like CO02 → Environment → Changes in the On-Premise system?

  3. If this is not available, is there any workaround (e.g. CDS view, key user extensibility, analytics, or Enable Change Record)?

  4. How do other customers monitor or audit modifications to production orders?

Any guidance, best practices, or app names would be really appreciated. Thank you!

Best regards,
Youzheng Tu

entry.title: Manage Supplier Quotation App Always Creates PO with NB Document Type
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am converting an awarded supplier quotation to a purchase order using the Manage Supplier Quotations app (Follow-On Document option). It always creates a purchase order with document type NB.

I have already added a custom document type in configuration, but I am unable to use or select it during the conversion. The same issue occurs in the private cloud system as well.

Can anyone please explain why this happens and how to overcome it?
My requirement is to use a custom-defined document type (not NB) or to have the option to select the PO document type while converting the quotation to a purchase order.

Regards,

Vinith K

entry.title: Interdependencies between date fields in SAPapps “Manage/Create Sales Orders” and “Display Material"
entry.content:
During daily operations with the Manage Sales Orders and Display Material apps, recurring challenges occur due to the logic and dependencies of several date fields. These fields influence each other and can lead to process blockages or require manual intervention when creating deliveries or planning material availability.

Observed Issues

  • Delivery creation is blocked when “Planned Delivery Time” is set too high.
  • Manual adjustments of date fields are often necessary to complete processes.
  • Unclear system logic regarding which date takes precedence or gets overwritten.
  • Lack of transparency in how changes to one field affect others.

Objectives

  • is there any Document for logic and dependencies of the date fields clearly.
  • Do we need to do any improvements in master data (e.g., realistic “Planned Delivery Time” values).

entry.title: How to attach the billing document PDF into XML for eInvoice Belgium in SAP S/4Hana Public Cloud?
entry.content:
Hi,

We configured Peppol for Belgium and sending and receiving works.

We are on public cloud and would like to attach the customer billing document PDF to the XML (DRC) send to the end customer.

Can you please guide us how to do this? Any BAdI is available?

 

 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

entry.title: Project Financial Booklet
entry.content:
Good evening, I am performing budget control for investment projects in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud.

I would like to know which applications are best for assessing their viability. I usually use the project budget report, or previously I also viewed it in Analytical Apps for Plan/Actual Analysis, but due to the release, Project Financial Booklet will be used instead. However, according to what I have read on the SAP Help Portal, it only works for projects with income, just as Project Financial Booklet is used for expense projects or statistical projects. – Professional Services.

Does anyone know if this application would be suitable for investment projects? I can't seem to view it myself.

Or, if it is not suitable, is there another application that can be used to view it that is not mentioned?

Thank you very much in advance. Best regards,

Juan Antonio Moyano

entry.title: Customer Master Data - Updation in SAP S/4 Hana Public cloud
entry.content:
Issue: Unable to Update a Field After Customer Master Upload – “Start Mass Maintenance - Business Partner” App Deprecated

After uploading the customer master data, I needed to update one specific field in the Business Partner record.

Previously, I used the “Start Mass Maintenance – Business Partner” app for such updates. (I want below screen , but unable to find)

 

However, this app has now been deprecated and is no longer available in the current SAP S/4HANA Cloud catalog, in PRD system.

I have tried to find an alternate app for performing mass updates or field-level changes in Business Partner master data, but couldn’t locate any suitable replacement.

Could anyone please suggest a solution or alternate approach/app to achieve the same functionality?

Best regards,

Tehreem Fatima

entry.title: How to prepare FS for custom purchase order form in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I am working in a public cloud implementation project. My client requested to develop a new purchase order output form based on their existing format. The standard form layout is not matching their requirement.

I have to provide a functional specification (FS) to my technical team, but I am not sure how to prepare it. The new form will be developed using Adobe LiveCycle Designer, and there are no tables or fields — only data binding options are available.

How can I prepare FS for this kind of requirement? Please share any sample FS or example, at least for supplier details and purchase order number, so I can continue from that.

Regards,

Vinith K

entry.title: Balance Carryforward - S/4 Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm currently facing an issue in the context of a support project on SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition. The client has requested a custom field in the balance sheet to display consolidation adjustments by company code. However, during the balance carryforward process, the values in this custom field are not being transferred into the opening balance of the next fiscal year.

Do you know if this is standard behavior for custom fields in the Public Cloud Edition, or could it be related to a configuration setting?

Any insights or suggestions would be greatly appreciated.

entry.title: How to move or delete a task from a Transport Request?
entry.content:
Hello,

 

I need to release a Transport Request but there are some changes in this TR that cannot be released. 

Is is possible to move a task from a particular Transport Request into a new Transport? 

Also, is it possible to delete a task that we do not want to release?

 

Thank you. 


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Record of Achievement Badge Link Redirects to Previous Badge
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I successfully completed the course “Exploring Localisation as a Self-Service with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition” on learning.sap.com. I also received a confirmation email about the completion.

However, when I click “View Badge” on my profile, it redirects to my previous badge instead of showing the new one for this course.

The badges are issued through Credly by Pearson, so I checked there as well, but the new badge has not appeared yet.

Has anyone else experienced this issue? How long does it usually take for a new badge to appear? Do you know any solution for this?

Thank you for your help!

Best regards,
Buddini

entry.title: RFQ
entry.content:
Dear experts, 

In the RFQ document, a delivery date is specified centrally for each item. However, when creating the Supplier Quotation, there is no option to enter or modify the delivery date based on the supplier. How can we capture situations where a supplier is able to deliver the materials earlier than the delivery date specified in the RFQ? Should this be considered as a factor when evaluating and selecting the best supplier quotation? Also add to this is there an option to enter Warranty details in Supplier quotation.

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: PO numbering
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

Our client has over 20 companies and manages procurement centrally. In this scenario, each company requires separate PO document numbering. In the standard system, this can be achieved by creating a distinct document type for each company. However, maintaining and using more than 20 document types is not a recommended or efficient solution.

Is there an alternative approach or recommended workaround to maintain company-wise document numbering without creating multiple document types?

Best regards,

Dinesh

entry.title: How to migrate service purchase order data by migration cockpit
entry.content:
Hi Dears
I am doing some migration work of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 
I want to migrate service purchase order whose acct assignment category is R (service order) by the migration cockpit.
But there is no service document option in the template. There is sales order, sales item and so on.

Is there any way to migrate service purchase order by migration cockpit?

I have got advice below

>The SAP Clean-Core approach recommends the following options:

  • Option A is to create Purchase Order Automatically from Service Orders (recommended by SAP)
  • Option B is to manually create post-migration: this is if you really need to migrate legacy POs for reporting.
  • Option C suggest a technical migration, where you use the side-by-side API approach. This should be considered if you need to preserve bulk historical data.
    But I have not solved my problem. 

# Data Migration Cockpit
# SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 
# Service Purchase Order

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud: Table Access for India Withholding Tax Configuration Details
entry.content:
Hello,

Where can get the following data in public cloud?

 

FIWTIN_ACC_EXEM - PAN-based accumulation for exemption tracking 
 J_1IEWT_ACC - Accumulated TDS base and tax amounts for threshold monitoring   
 J_1IEWT_ACC_H - Header table for accumulated TDS data  
 J_1IEWT_ACC_I - Item-level accumulation details  

WITH_ITEM - Withholding tax line items


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: 在SAP系统所有账套共用调整汇率且可为记账汇率，如果维护了汇率后，那后续所有账套新增的账务处理都会用这个调整汇率，而不是用系统的记账汇率；如何能够调整汇率单独仅仅用于调汇使用，且记账汇率与调整汇率分开
entry.content:
在SAP系统所有账套共用调整汇率且可为记账汇率，如果维护了汇率后，那后续所有账套新增的账务处理都会用这个调整汇率，而不是用系统的记账汇率；如何能够调整汇率单独仅仅用于调汇使用，且记账汇率与调整汇率分开？
All account sets in SAP system share the adjustment exchange rate, which can be the bookkeeping exchange rate. If the exchange rate is maintained, the adjustment exchange rate will be used instead of the bookkeeping exchange rate of the system for all subsequent account sets. How can we adjust the exchange rate only for foreign exchange adjustment, and separate the bookkeeping exchange rate from the adjustment exchange rate?

entry.title: DMEE SA_CGI_XML_CT node .../CdtTrfTxInf/RgltryRptg/Dtls does not showing any values
entry.content:
Dear SAP support,

DMEE SA_CGI_XML_CT node CstmrCdtTrfInitn/PmtInf/CdtTrfTxInf/RgltryRptg/Dtls does not show any values.

This should populate information based on our business requirements. How does it populate values?

BR
